text: Abu Hassan Penchuri (Abu Hassan The Thief) is a 1955 Singaporean romantic fantasy film directed by B. N. Rao and starring P. Ramlee, Mariam, Nordin Ahmad. ==Cast== * P. Ramlee as Abu Hassan * Mariam Baharum (aka Tahi Lalat) as Puteri Faridah * Nordin Ahmad as Putera Raja Tartar * Mohd Hamid (Ahmad C) as Kassim * Daeng Idris as Bapa Puteri Faridah * Malik Sutan Muda * S. Shamsuddin * Ali Rahman * Shariff Dol * Wan Hazim * Habsah ==External links== * *Abu Hassan Penchuri / 1955 - Filem Malaysia Category:1955 films Category:1950s romantic fantasy films Category:Malaysian black-and-white films Category:Malay-language films Category:Malaysian films Category:Singaporean black-and-white films Category:Films scored by P. Ramlee Category:Malay Film Productions films Category:Malaysian romance films Category:Malaysian fantasy films Category:Films shot in Singapore Category:Films set in Baghdad Category:Films about poverty
title: Abu Hassan Penchuri
